ResourceHeader.ResourceName: List of Flares observed by Yohkoh/SXT and TRACE
ResourceHeader.Description: This list is compiled from the Yohkoh flare directories at ISAS/JAXA,Japan, as maintained by Mr. Sawa and the online TRACE catalog generated by SSW (SolarSoftWare).

AccessURL.Description: List of Flares jointly observed by SXT and TRACE (Updated Mar 08, 2002)

Parameter.Name: SXT PFI file (at ISAS)
Parameter.Description: Link to the SXT PFI file at ISAS.

Parameter.Name: SXT Date
Parameter.Description: Date of first flare mode SXT image.

Parameter.Name: tst_sx
Parameter.Description: Time of first flare mode SXT image.

Parameter.Name: ten_sx
Parameter.Description: Time of last flare mode SXT image.

Parameter.Name: GOES
Parameter.Description: The peak GOES flux during the period SXT flare mode images are taken.

Parameter.Name: Nimg
Parameter.Description: Number of flare mode SXT images.

Parameter.Name: Xc
Parameter.Description: Coordinates (in arcsec from disk center) of the center of the 6th SXT flare mode image. Picked up the 6th because SXT sometimes changes the field of view after the first flare mode image.

Parameter.Name: Yc
Parameter.Description: Coordinates (in arcsec from disk center) of the center of the 6th SXT flare mode image. Picked up the 6th because SXT sometimes changes the field of view after the first flare mode image.

Parameter.Name: TRACE tst
Parameter.Description: Times of the first TRACE images in the period (tst_sx(SXT)-30 min, ten_sx(SXT)+30 min).

Parameter.Name: ten
Parameter.Description: Times of the last TRACE images in the period (tst_sx(SXT)-30 min, ten_sx(SXT)+30 min).

Parameter.Name: tcl
Parameter.Description: Time of the TRACE image closest to tst_sx .

Parameter.Name: WLdom
Parameter.Description: Wavelength at which the greatest number of images is taken.

Parameter.Name: Xc
Parameter.Description: Coordinates (in arcsec from disk center) of the center of the TRACE image at tcl.

Parameter.Name: Yc
Parameter.Description: Coordinates (in arcsec from disk center) of the center of the TRACE image at tcl.

Parameter.Name: NWL
Parameter.Description: Number of TRACE images at each wavelength. These include smaller-size (Nx<=256) images not overlapped with larger-size images. The plots indicate them differently.
